trans-unit.source: Represents a symbol writer for managed code.
trans-unit.target: 代表 Managed 程式碼的符號寫入器。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Diagnostics.SymbolStore.ISymbolWriter> interface provides methods that define documents, sequence points, lexical scopes, and variables.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Diagnostics.SymbolStore.ISymbolWriter>介面會提供定義文件，序列點、 語彙範圍和變數的方法。

trans-unit.source: This interface is the managed counterpart of the `ISymUnmanagedWriter` interface, which is one of the unmanaged symbol store interfaces that provides an alternative way to read and write debug symbol information.
trans-unit.target: 這個介面是 managed 對應項目`ISymUnmanagedWriter`介面，也就是其中一個 unmanaged 的符號存放區介面提供的替代方法來讀取和寫入偵錯符號資訊。

trans-unit.source: Closes <see cref="T:System.Diagnostics.SymbolStore.ISymbolWriter" /> and commits the symbols to the symbol store.
trans-unit.target: 關閉 <see cref="T:System.Diagnostics.SymbolStore.ISymbolWriter" /> 和認可符號存放區的符號。

trans-unit.source: After this call, <xref:System.Diagnostics.SymbolStore.ISymbolWriter> becomes invalid for further updates.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫後，<xref:System.Diagnostics.SymbolStore.ISymbolWriter>就會變成無效的進一步更新。

trans-unit.source: Closes the current method.
trans-unit.target: 關閉目前的方法。

trans-unit.source: After a method is closed, you cannot define a symbol from within it.
trans-unit.target: 在關閉方法之後，您無法定義中的符號。

trans-unit.source: Closes the most recent namespace.
trans-unit.target: 關閉最近一次使用的命名空間。

trans-unit.source: The points past the last instruction in the scope.
trans-unit.target: 範圍中超過最後一個指令的點。

trans-unit.source: Closes the current lexical scope.
trans-unit.target: 關閉目前的語彙範圍。

trans-unit.source: After a scope is closed, you cannot define a variable from within it.
trans-unit.target: 關閉範圍之後，您無法從定義變數中。

trans-unit.source: The URL that identifies the document.
trans-unit.target: 識別文件的 URL。

trans-unit.source: The document language.
trans-unit.target: 文件語言。

trans-unit.source: This parameter can be <see cref="F:System.Guid.Empty" />.
trans-unit.target: 這個參數可以是 <see cref="F:System.Guid.Empty" />。

trans-unit.source: The identity of the vendor for the document language.
trans-unit.target: 文件語言的廠商識別。

trans-unit.source: This parameter can be <see cref="F:System.Guid.Empty" />.
trans-unit.target: 這個參數可以是 <see cref="F:System.Guid.Empty" />。

trans-unit.source: The type of the document.
trans-unit.target: 文件的類型。

trans-unit.source: This parameter can be <see cref="F:System.Guid.Empty" />.
trans-unit.target: 這個參數可以是 <see cref="F:System.Guid.Empty" />。

trans-unit.source: Defines a source document.
trans-unit.target: 定義來源文件。

trans-unit.source: The object that represents the document.
trans-unit.target: 表示文件的物件。

trans-unit.source: The metadata type or method token.
trans-unit.target: 中繼資料 (Metadata) 類型或方法語彙基元 (Token)。

trans-unit.source: The field name.
trans-unit.target: 欄位名稱。

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of the field attributes.
trans-unit.target: 欄位屬性 (Attribute) 的位元組合。

trans-unit.source: The field signature.
trans-unit.target: 欄位簽章。

trans-unit.source: The address types for <c>addr1</c> and <c>addr2</c>.
trans-unit.target: <c>addr1</c> 和 <c>addr2</c> 的位址類型。

trans-unit.source: The first address for the field specification.
trans-unit.target: 欄位規格的第一個位址。

trans-unit.source: The second address for the field specification.
trans-unit.target: 欄位規格的第二個位址。

trans-unit.source: The third address for the field specification.
trans-unit.target: 欄位規格的第三個位址。

trans-unit.source: Defines a field in a type or a global field.
trans-unit.target: 定義型別中的欄位或全域欄位。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Diagnostics.SymbolStore.ISymbolWriter.DefineField%2A> method defines a single variable that is not within a method by using specified fields in classes, bit fields, and so on.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Diagnostics.SymbolStore.ISymbolWriter.DefineField%2A>方法定義單一變數方法內不是使用指定的欄位中的類別、 位元欄位等等。

trans-unit.source: The global variable name.
trans-unit.target: 全域變數名稱。

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of the global variable attributes.
trans-unit.target: 全域變數屬性的位元組合。

trans-unit.source: The global variable signature.
trans-unit.target: 全域變數簽章。

trans-unit.source: The address types for <c>addr1</c>, <c>addr2</c>, and <c>addr3</c>.
trans-unit.target: <c>addr1</c>、<c>addr2</c> 和 <c>addr3</c> 的位址類型。

trans-unit.source: The first address for the global variable specification.
trans-unit.target: 全域變數規格的第一個位址。

trans-unit.source: The second address for the global variable specification.
trans-unit.target: 全域變數規格的第二個位址。

trans-unit.source: The third address for the global variable specification.
trans-unit.target: 全域變數規格的第三個位址。

trans-unit.source: Defines a single global variable.
trans-unit.target: 定義單一全域變數。

trans-unit.source: The local variable name.
trans-unit.target: 區域變數名稱。

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of the local variable attributes.
trans-unit.target: 區域變數屬性的位元組合。

trans-unit.source: The local variable signature.
trans-unit.target: 區域變數簽章。

trans-unit.source: The address types for <c>addr1</c>, <c>addr2</c>, and <c>addr3</c>.
trans-unit.target: <c>addr1</c>、<c>addr2</c> 和 <c>addr3</c> 的位址類型。

trans-unit.source: The first address for the local variable specification.
trans-unit.target: 區域變數規格的第一個位址。

trans-unit.source: The second address for the local variable specification.
trans-unit.target: 區域變數規格的第二個位址。

trans-unit.source: The third address for the local variable specification.
trans-unit.target: 區域變數規格的第三個位址。

trans-unit.source: The start offset for the variable.
trans-unit.target: 變數的起始位移。

trans-unit.source: If this parameter is zero, it is ignored and the variable is defined throughout the entire scope.
trans-unit.target: 如果這個參數是零，則會忽略它，並定義整個範圍的變數。

trans-unit.source: If the parameter is nonzero, the variable falls within the offsets of the current scope.
trans-unit.target: 如果這個參數不是零，該變數便會落在目前範圍的位移內。

trans-unit.source: The end offset for the variable.
trans-unit.target: 變數的結束位移。

trans-unit.source: If this parameter is zero, it is ignored and the variable is defined throughout the entire scope.
trans-unit.target: 如果這個參數是零，則會忽略它，並定義整個範圍的變數。

trans-unit.source: If the parameter is nonzero, the variable falls within the offsets of the current scope.
trans-unit.target: 如果這個參數不是零，該變數便會落在目前範圍的位移內。

trans-unit.source: Defines a single variable in the current lexical scope.
trans-unit.target: 在目前的語彙範圍中定義單一變數。

trans-unit.source: The `startOffset` and `endOffset` parameters are optional.
trans-unit.target: `startOffset`和`endOffset`參數是選擇性的。

trans-unit.source: If their value is zero, they are ignored and the variable is defined throughout the entire scope.
trans-unit.target: 如果其值為零，則會予以忽略，並會在整個範圍中定義變數。

trans-unit.source: If their value is nonzero, the variable falls within the offsets of the current scope.
trans-unit.target: 如果其值為非零，變數會落在目前範圍的位移之內。

trans-unit.source: You can call <xref:System.Diagnostics.SymbolStore.ISymbolWriter.DefineLocalVariable%2A> multiple times for a variable of the same name that occurs multiple times in different offset ranges throughout a scope.
trans-unit.target: 您可以呼叫<xref:System.Diagnostics.SymbolStore.ISymbolWriter.DefineLocalVariable%2A>多次的不同範圍的位移範圍中出現多個相同名稱的變數。

trans-unit.source: (In this case, start and end offsets must not overlap.)
trans-unit.target: （在此情況下，開始和結束位移不能重疊。）

trans-unit.source: The parameter name.
trans-unit.target: 參數名稱。

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of the parameter attributes.
trans-unit.target: 參數屬性的位元組合。

trans-unit.source: The parameter signature.
trans-unit.target: 參數簽章。

trans-unit.source: The address types for <c>addr1</c>, <c>addr2</c>, and <c>addr3</c>.
trans-unit.target: <c>addr1</c>、<c>addr2</c> 和 <c>addr3</c> 的位址類型。

trans-unit.source: The first address for the parameter specification.
trans-unit.target: 參數規格的第一個位址。

trans-unit.source: The second address for the parameter specification.
trans-unit.target: 參數規格的第二個位址。

trans-unit.source: The third address for the parameter specification.
trans-unit.target: 參數規格的第三個位址。

trans-unit.source: Defines a single parameter in the current method.
trans-unit.target: 定義目前方法中的單一參數。

trans-unit.source: The type of each parameter is taken from its position within the signature of the method.
trans-unit.target: 每一個參數的型別是從它位於方法簽章內的位置中取出。

trans-unit.source: If parameters are defined in the metadata for a given method, you do not have to define them again with calls to this method.
trans-unit.target: 如果參數指定方法的中繼資料中定義的您不必重新定義與呼叫此方法。

trans-unit.source: Symbol readers need to check for these in the normal metadata first, and then use the symbol store.
trans-unit.target: 符號讀取器必須首先，檢查這些一般的中繼資料中，然後使用 符號存放區。

trans-unit.source: The document object for which the sequence points are being defined.
trans-unit.target: 要為其定義序列點的文件物件。

trans-unit.source: The sequence point offsets measured from the beginning of methods.
trans-unit.target: 從方法的開頭來測量的序列點位移。

trans-unit.source: The document lines for the sequence points.
trans-unit.target: 序列點的文件行。

trans-unit.source: The document positions for the sequence points.
trans-unit.target: 序列點的文件位置。

trans-unit.source: The document end lines for the sequence points.
trans-unit.target: 序列點的文件結束行。

trans-unit.source: The document end positions for the sequence points.
trans-unit.target: 序列點的文件結束位置。

trans-unit.source: Defines a group of sequence points within the current method.
trans-unit.target: 在目前的方法內定義一組序列點。

trans-unit.source: Each line and each column defines the start of a statement within a method.
trans-unit.target: 每一行和每個資料行定義方法內的陳述式的開始。

trans-unit.source: The arrays should be sorted in increasing order of offsets.
trans-unit.target: 陣列的位移遞增順序排序。

trans-unit.source: The offset is always the offset from the start of the method, in bytes.
trans-unit.target: 此位移為一律從方法，以位元組為單位的起始位移。

trans-unit.source: The metadata emitter interface.
trans-unit.target: 中繼資料發出器介面。

trans-unit.source: The file name for which the debugging symbols are written.
trans-unit.target: 偵錯符號寫入的檔案名稱。

trans-unit.source: Some writers require a file name, and others do not.
trans-unit.target: 有些寫入器需要檔名，有些則不需要。

trans-unit.source: If a file name is specified for a writer that does not use file names, this parameter is ignored.
trans-unit.target: 如果檔案名稱是指定給不使用檔案名稱的寫入器，則這個參數會被忽略。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> indicates that this is a full rebuild; <see langword="false" /> indicates that this is an incremental compilation.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 表示這是完整重建，而 <see langword="false" /> 則表示這是累加編譯。

trans-unit.source: Sets the metadata emitter interface to associate with a writer.
trans-unit.target: 設定要與寫入器產生關聯的中繼資料發出者介面。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Diagnostics.SymbolStore.ISymbolWriter.Initialize%2A> also sets the output file name where the debugging symbols are written.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Diagnostics.SymbolStore.ISymbolWriter.Initialize%2A> 也會設定輸出檔名稱的偵錯符號寫入的位置。

trans-unit.source: This method can be called only once and must be called before any other writer methods.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法可以呼叫一次，必須在任何其他寫入器方法之前呼叫。

trans-unit.source: The metadata token for the method to be opened.
trans-unit.target: 要開啟之方法的中繼資料語彙基元。

trans-unit.source: Opens a method to place symbol information into.
trans-unit.target: 開啟要置入符號資訊的方法。

trans-unit.source: The specified method becomes the current method for calls to define sequence points, parameters, and lexical scopes.
trans-unit.target: 指定的方法會變成目前的方法呼叫來定義序列點、 參數和語彙範圍。

trans-unit.source: There is an implicit lexical scope around the entire method.
trans-unit.target: 沒有隱含的語彙範圍整個方法。

trans-unit.source: Reopening a method that has been previously closed erases any previously defined symbols for the method.
trans-unit.target: 重新開啟先前未關閉的方法，會清除任何先前定義的符號的方法。

trans-unit.source: The name of the new namespace.
trans-unit.target: 新命名空間名稱。

trans-unit.source: Opens a new namespace.
trans-unit.target: 開啟新的命名空間。

trans-unit.source: Call this method before defining methods or variables that exist within a namespace.
trans-unit.target: 定義在命名空間中存在的方法或變數之前呼叫這個方法。

trans-unit.source: Namespaces can be nested.
trans-unit.target: 可以是巢狀命名空間。

trans-unit.source: The offset, in bytes, from the beginning of the method to the first instruction in the lexical scope.
trans-unit.target: 從方法開頭到語彙範圍中第一個指令的位移 (以位元組為單位)。

trans-unit.source: Opens a new lexical scope in the current method.
trans-unit.target: 開啟目前方法中的新語彙範圍。

trans-unit.source: An opaque scope identifier that can be used with <see cref="M:System.Diagnostics.SymbolStore.ISymbolWriter.SetScopeRange(System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32)" /> to define the start and end offsets of a scope at a later time.
trans-unit.target: 不透明範圍識別項，稍後可以與 <see cref="M:System.Diagnostics.SymbolStore.ISymbolWriter.SetScopeRange(System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32)" /> 一起用來定義範圍的起始和結束位移。

trans-unit.source: In this case, the offsets passed to <see cref="M:System.Diagnostics.SymbolStore.ISymbolWriter.OpenScope(System.Int32)" /> and <see cref="M:System.Diagnostics.SymbolStore.ISymbolWriter.CloseScope(System.Int32)" /> are ignored.
trans-unit.target: 在這種情況下，傳遞到 <see cref="M:System.Diagnostics.SymbolStore.ISymbolWriter.OpenScope(System.Int32)" /> 和 <see cref="M:System.Diagnostics.SymbolStore.ISymbolWriter.CloseScope(System.Int32)" /> 的位移會被忽略。

trans-unit.source: A scope identifier is valid only in the current method.
trans-unit.target: 範圍識別項只有在目前方法中才會有效。

trans-unit.source: This scope becomes the new current scope and is pushed onto a stack of scopes.
trans-unit.target: 這個範圍會變成新的目前範圍，並且推送至堆疊的範圍。

trans-unit.source: Scopes must form a hierarchy.
trans-unit.target: 範圍必須形成階層。

trans-unit.source: Siblings are not allowed to overlap.
trans-unit.target: 同層級不允許重疊。

trans-unit.source: Scope identifiers are valid only in the current method.
trans-unit.target: 範圍識別項會在目前的方法中才有效。

trans-unit.source: The document that contains the starting position.
trans-unit.target: 包含開始位置的文件。

trans-unit.source: The starting line number.
trans-unit.target: 開始的行號。

trans-unit.source: The starting column.
trans-unit.target: 開始的欄。

trans-unit.source: The document that contains the ending position.
trans-unit.target: 包含結束位置的文件。

trans-unit.source: The ending line number.
trans-unit.target: 結束的行號。

trans-unit.source: The ending column number.
trans-unit.target: 結束的欄號。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the true start and end of a method within a source file.
trans-unit.target: 指定原始程式檔內方法的實際開頭和結尾。

trans-unit.source: Use <see cref="M:System.Diagnostics.SymbolStore.ISymbolWriter.SetMethodSourceRange(System.Diagnostics.SymbolStore.ISymbolDocumentWriter,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Diagnostics.SymbolStore.ISymbolDocumentWriter,System.Int32,System.Int32)" /> to specify the extent of a method, independent of the sequence points that exist within the method.
trans-unit.target: 使用 <see cref="M:System.Diagnostics.SymbolStore.ISymbolWriter.SetMethodSourceRange(System.Diagnostics.SymbolStore.ISymbolDocumentWriter,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Diagnostics.SymbolStore.ISymbolDocumentWriter,System.Int32,System.Int32)" /> 來指定方法的範圍，以及存在於方法內的獨立序列點。

trans-unit.source: The identifier of the lexical scope.
trans-unit.target: 語彙範圍的識別項。

trans-unit.source: The byte offset of the beginning of the lexical scope.
trans-unit.target: 語彙範圍開頭的位元組位移。

trans-unit.source: The byte offset of the end of the lexical scope.
trans-unit.target: 語彙範圍結尾的位元組位移。

trans-unit.source: Defines the offset range for the specified lexical scope.
trans-unit.target: 定義指定語彙範圍的位移範圍。

trans-unit.source: The metadata token for which the attribute is being defined.
trans-unit.target: 要為其定義屬性的中繼資料語彙基元。

trans-unit.source: The attribute name.
trans-unit.target: 屬性名稱。

trans-unit.source: The attribute value.
trans-unit.target: 屬性值。

trans-unit.source: Defines an attribute when given the attribute name and the attribute value.
trans-unit.target: 在指定屬性名稱和屬性值時定義屬性。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Diagnostics.SymbolStore.ISymbolWriter.SetSymAttribute%2A> method is only associated with symbolic information and is not a metadata custom attribute.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Diagnostics.SymbolStore.ISymbolWriter.SetSymAttribute%2A>方法僅符號資訊相關聯，而且不是中繼資料的自訂屬性。

trans-unit.source: A pointer to code that represents the underlying writer.
trans-unit.target: 程式碼的指標，該程式碼代表基礎寫入器。

trans-unit.source: Sets the underlying <see langword="ISymUnmanagedWriter" /> (the corresponding unmanaged interface) that a managed <see cref="T:System.Diagnostics.SymbolStore.ISymbolWriter" /> uses to emit symbols.
trans-unit.target: 設定 Managed <see cref="T:System.Diagnostics.SymbolStore.ISymbolWriter" /> 用來發出符號的基礎 <see langword="ISymUnmanagedWriter" /> (對應的 Unmanaged 介面)。

trans-unit.source: The underlying `ISymUnmanagedWriter` (the corresponding unmanaged interface) represents a symbol writer for managed code.
trans-unit.target: 基礎`ISymUnmanagedWriter`（對應的 unmanaged 的介面） 代表 managed 程式碼的符號寫入器。

trans-unit.source: The interface provides methods for defining documents, sequence points, lexical scopes, and variables.
trans-unit.target: 介面會提供用於定義文件，序列點、 語彙範圍和變數的方法。

trans-unit.source: The metadata token for the method that is the user entry point.
trans-unit.target: 方法的中繼資料語彙基元，這是使用者進入點。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the user-defined method as the entry point for the current module.
trans-unit.target: 識別使用者定義的方法做為目前模組的進入點。

trans-unit.source: This is normally your main method, rather than compiler-generated stubs before the main method.
trans-unit.target: 這通常是您主要的方法，而不是之前的主要方式編譯器產生的 stub。

trans-unit.source: The fully qualified name of the namespace.
trans-unit.target: 命名空間的完整名稱。

trans-unit.source: Specifies that the given, fully qualified namespace name is used within the open lexical scope.
trans-unit.target: 指定是在開放式語彙範圍內使用指定且完整的命名空間名稱。

trans-unit.source: Closing the current scope prevents this scope from using the namespace.
trans-unit.target: 關閉目前的範圍，可防止這個範圍內使用命名空間。

trans-unit.source: The namespace remains in use in all scopes that inherit from the current open scope.
trans-unit.target: 命名空間中保持使用中的所有領域都繼承自目前開啟的範圍。
